name: ColorBombMix
description:
ColorBomb : FaceBomb + vivid color and lighting. A bit picky of prompts.

More info : https://huggingface.co/mocker/KaBoom

meta.prompt: ((masterpiece, best quality, ultra-detailed, high-resolution)), solo, beautiful girl, gleaming eye, perfect eye, age 15, black white gold theme,
